issues.description: The solution repository defines the Farmâ€™s `animals` attribute as a `Set<Animal>` initialized with a `HashSet`, but the problem statement explicitly requires a `List<Animal>` implemented using an `ArrayList`. This mismatch will confuse students about which collection type to use and prevent them from following the specified design.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the `animals` field in Farm.java from `Set<Animal>` to `List<Animal>` and initialize it with a new `ArrayList<>()`. Also update the getter and setter to use `List<Animal>` instead of `Set<Animal>`.
